code: import React from'react';import'./Notifications.css';import logo from'./close-image.png';import{getLatestNotification}from'./utils';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Notifications(){const handleClick=()=>{console.log('Close button has been clicked');};const inlineStyle={position:'absolute',top:'10px',right:'10px',display:'inline-block',background:'transparent',fontSize:'15px',cursor:'pointer',border:'none',wiidth:'auto '};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Notifications",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here is the list of notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"default",children:"New course available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",children:"New resume available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:`${getLatestNotification()}`}})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button","aria-label":"Close",onClick:handleClick,style:inlineStyle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"close-icon",style:{width:'10px',height:'10px'}})})]});}
